derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from late Latin plenarius 'complete', from plenus 'full'

entry.def: A plenary session or plenary meeting is one that is attended by everyone who has the right to attend.

example.ex: The programme was approved at a plenary session of the Central Committee last week.
example.tran: 这个方案在上周的中央委员会全体会议上获得了通过。

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无限的、绝对的,充分的, 完全的
stems_affixes.word_buile: plen满,填满+ary……的→adj.无限的、绝对的,充分的, 完全的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 许多的, 大量的, 丰富的, 丰饶的
stems_affixes.word_buile: plenty丰富+ful表形容词→plentiful许多的, 大量的
plenty[n.丰富,大量]+itude状态→plentitude满的状态→充分
de去掉+plen满,填满+ish表动词→去掉满→倒空
re再+plen满,填满+ish表动词→再弄满
